outputs.name: dir
outputs.description:
A data collection of direct normal irradiance values at each timestep
of the Wea.

outputs.name: diff
outputs.description:
A data collection of diffuse sky solar irradiance values at each
timestep of the Wea.

outputs.name: glob
outputs.description:
A data collection of global horizontal irradiance values at each
timestep of the Wea.

name: HB Deconstruct Wea
description:
Deconstruct a Wea object into data collections of direct, diffuse, and golbal
irradiance at each timestep of the file.
-
